info.prettypipes.blacklist.description: Items in filter slots are disallowed
info.prettypipes.cancel_all.desc:
Stops waiting for current crafting outputs
Ongoing crafting operations are still completed
Hold Shift to include ongoing crafting operations,
which may cause partial recipes to stay behind
info.prettypipes.crafting_module:
Allows automatically crafting items into other items using the connected block
Doesn't automatically extract from the block
Input and output slots vary by tier
Supports auto-filling from JEI if installed
info.prettypipes.crafting_terminal:
Allows requesting ingredients for crafting recipes
Supports auto-filling from JEI if installed
info.prettypipes.damage_filter_modifier: Causes any filter slots to filter by item damage
info.prettypipes.emit_redstone.descripti:
Whether a redstone signal should be emitted when all crafting items have arrived
If the module is set to insert items individually or per craft, a redstone signal is emitted for each set of items required for a single crafting operation
§oRecommended for use with the Crafter
info.prettypipes.extraction_module:
Pulls items from adjacent inventories
Filters and pull rates vary by tier
Medium and high tiers prevent over-sending
info.prettypipes.filter_increase_modifie:
Adds additional filter slots to the pipe
Slots will be used by any module that filters items
info.prettypipes.filter_module:
Restricts flow from pipes into adjacent inventories
Filter amount varies by tier
info.prettypipes.high_priority_module:
Increases the reception priority of adjacent inventories
Higher priority means items will prefer this inventory, regardless of distance
info.prettypipes.hold_alt: Hold Alt or Backspace to request anyway
info.prettypipes.insert_unstacked.descri:
Whether items should be inserted one at a time, rather than as a stack, causing them to be spread out in some containers
§oRecommended for use with the Crafter
info.prettypipes.insertion_type.all.desc: Causes the module to request all items required for the entire crafting request at once, even if the request consists of multiple crafting operations
info.prettypipes.insertion_type.per_craf: Causes the module to request all items for a single crafting operation at once
info.prettypipes.insertion_type.per_item:
Causes the module to request items individually so that they will be inserted in the order they appear in the input slots
§oRecommended for use with the Crafter
info.prettypipes.item_terminal:
Allows viewing and requesting all items in a pipe network
Also has slots for putting items into the network
info.prettypipes.low_priority_module:
Decreases the reception priority of adjacent inventories
Lower priority means items will prefer other inventories, regardless of distance
info.prettypipes.mod_filter_modifier: Causes any filter slots to filter by mod
info.prettypipes.nbt_filter_modifier: Causes any filter slots to filter by item data (NBT)
info.prettypipes.no_pipe_connected: The terminal needs to be connected to a pipe network
info.prettypipes.order.name: Name
info.prettypipes.pipe_frame:
Attach to a pipe or pipe-adjacent block
Shows amount of an item in the pipe's network
info.prettypipes.populate.description: Populate filter slots with items from adjacent inventories
info.prettypipes.pressurizer:
Drastically increases item speed in the entire pipe network
Requires FE (or RF) for each item transferred
info.prettypipes.random_sorting_modifier:
Causes extracted items to choose destinations randomly
Priority modules will be ignored
info.prettypipes.redstone_module:
Allows disabling the pipe with a redstone signal
Works for extraction, retrieval and crafting
info.prettypipes.retrieval_module:
Pulls items from other inventories in the network
Filters and pull rates vary by tier
Medium and high tiers prevent over-sending
info.prettypipes.round_robin_sorting_mod:
Causes extracted items to choose destinations in a round robin fashion
Ordering is based on distance and priority
info.prettypipes.speed_module:
Increases speed of items exiting adjacent inventories
Speed varies by tier
info.prettypipes.stack_size_module:
Limits the amount of items that can enter adjacent inventories
Automatically prevents over-sending
info.prettypipes.tag_filter_modifier:
Causes any filter slots to filter by tags
Tag can be chosen from items in filter slots
info.prettypipes.too_many_pipes_connecte: The terminal can only be connected to a single pipe at a time
info.prettypipes.whitelist.description: Items in filter slots are allowed
info.prettypipes.wrench:
Allows modifying pipe connections
Places blocks in offhand as covers
Sneak to remove cover or pipe
